caption.p: (a) DRIFTS spectra of the solids formed in the experiments with 0.33 M MgCl 2 and CaCl 2 solutions. The spectra are offset for clarity. (b) Secondary electron images of crystals formed in zabuyelite growth solutions with 0.33 M CaCl 2, and (c) precipitates from zabuyelite growth solutions with 0.33 M MgCl 2.
